title: Fund for Innovation and Excellence in Jewish Studies
description: To support the sustainability of the Program in Jewish Studies at CU Boulder and the continued elevation of the Program's profile; locally, nationally, and internationally. If the fund reaches $25,000 within 1 year the fund will become an endowed fund.
marketingContent: The Fund for Innovation and Excellence in Jewish Studies ensures the future vitality and growth of Jewish Studies by supporting student success, public programming, and cutting-edge work by faculty and staff. Due to a generous lead gift from Katherine and John Rosenbloom, donations to the Fund through September 30, 2020 will be matched up to $12,500.
